memory[0]  = 32'b00000000100000000000000010010011; // addi x1, x0, 8
memory[1]  = 32'b00000000000000000010000100000011; // lw x2, 0(x0)
memory[2]  = 32'b00000000100000010001000110010011; // slli x3, x2, 8
memory[3]  = 32'b00000000000100010001001000110011; // sll x4, x2, x1
memory[4]  = 32'b00000000100000010101001010010011; // srli x5, x2, 8
memory[5]  = 32'b00000000000100010101001100110011; // srl x6, x2, x1
memory[6]  = 32'b01000000100000010101001110010011; // srai x7, x2, 8
memory[7]  = 32'b01000000000100010101010000110011; // sra x8, x2, x1

---
//First word is -65536 (or 0xFFFF0000)
mem[0] = 8'h00;
mem[1] = 8'h00;
mem[2] = 8'hFF;
mem[3] = 8'hFF;

---
Results
x1 = 8 
x2 = -65536 (0xFFFF0000)
x3 = x4 = 0xFF000000
x5 = x6 = 0x00FFFF00
x7 = x8 = 0xFFFFFF00
